# enabledFramings

**Instance Property**

An array of framings that the monitor is allowed to suggest.

## Declaration

```swift
var enabledFramings: [AVCaptureFraming] { get set }
```

## Discussion

The monitor is capable of recommending any of the framings in the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureSmartFramingMonitor/supportedFramings] array. This property contains the subset of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureSmartFramingMonitor/supportedFramings] you would like to have recommended to you. You may set this property at any time while running your [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureSession]. This property’s default value is the empty array.

## Configuring framings

- **supportedFramings**: An array of framings supported by the monitor in its current configuration.
- **recommendedFraming**: The latest recommended framing from the monitor.
